15121.content: (name) is a yound member of the Dragonic tribe by their terms only fifty years old but you have more then distinguished himself not only as a commander but as a warrior. Having killed more then sixty of the enemies Beserkers as they were called. But to him they were just a knock off of your kind. He had earned such a reputation of killing the Bersekers that he was asked to take on a new mission. He was asked to find where the Beserkers were coming from and destroy the place. Being also given full authority in this matter. So now he is sailing on a small boat approaching a unmark charted island and only one thing was going through his mind sensing weak little knock offs of the Beserkers. 'This is gonna be fun.' (name) choses to
15121.title: The journey begins

choices: Thankfull he saved them from their Yoma captors
151211.content: (name) stands up as his boat lands on the beach. He grabs his katana and places his hat onto his head. Walking onto the beach (name) could see the creatures in disquise as normal humans walking up to him looking shocked to see a boat of unknown origin land on their island. (name) was unsure whether it was genuine or they were acting. One of them approached (name). "Sir are you by any cahnce from across the sea?" It asked. "Yes I am and not human so your gonna die now." (name) says and in a split second later the disquised yoma fell to pieces shocking the rest by his speed and the only indication he drew his sword was it was slightly out of it's sheathe. The shock didn't last long as the ramaining Yoma dropped their disquises and charged him. Seconds later all of the yoma were dead the last one's skull caved in by (name)'s foot in his face. Only six remained on the beach besides him and they were all human. The humans were
151211.title: A yoma massacre

You fell in to the claymore world, You can chose to be normal or have the power of Gods. Here some rules


- No killing of the MC or supporting characters

-i will allow foot fetish and sex.

- the male will be refered to as (name)

- Do what you want with the 'normal or god' choice. but do not make it random stuff. please try to make it a story

Have fun
